meanings.sent1: She had to rerecorded the song after the first recording was lost.
meanings.sent2: The singer rerecorded the album to improve the sound quality.
meanings.sent3: He rerecorded the message so many times that he memorized it.
meanings.sent4: The artist rerecorded his emotions onto the canvas, creating a masterpiece.
meanings.sent5: The student rerecorded the lecture to listen to it while studying.

meanings.definition: To make a new recording of something
meanings.sent1: They rerecorded the interview to include additional information.
meanings.sent2: The band rerecorded their hit song for a special edition album.
meanings.sent3: She rerecorded the voicemail with a funny voice to surprise her friend.
meanings.sent4: The scientist rerecorded the data, hoping to find a new pattern.
meanings.sent5: He rerecorded the video to capture the sunset in better lighting.
